product.title: Product Not Found
product.message: The product you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.

service.title: Service Not Found
service.message: The service you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.

product.title: Loading Product Information
product.autoReload: The page will automatically reload in 3 seconds

subscription.question: Is this product requires a monthly subscription?
subscription.answer: No, this is a one-time purchase with lifetime usage. You will receive free updates during the warranty period.

activation.question: How do I activate the product after purchase?
activation.answer: After successful payment, you'll receive an email with account information and detailed activation instructions. If you need additional support, please contact our 24/7 support team.

multipleDevices.question: Can I use this product on multiple devices?
multipleDevices.answer: Each license is valid for one device. If you want to use it on multiple devices, please purchase additional licenses or contact us about enterprise packages.

support.question: How do I contact support?
support.answer: You can contact technical support via email at support@xlab.vn or through the Contact page on our website. Our support team works 24/7 and will respond within 24 hours.

compatibility.question: Is the software compatible with my operating system?
compatibility.answer: We support Windows 10/11, macOS 10.15+, and popular Linux distributions. You can view specific system requirements for each product on the product information page.

troubleshooting.question: I'm experiencing an issue with the software, what should I do?
troubleshooting.answer: First, make sure you're using the latest version of the software. If you're still experiencing issues, you can consult the documentation, community forums, or submit a support request through your account with a detailed description of the error and your environment.

vouchers.errorLoadingVoucher: An error occurred while loading vouchers
